attributes.action: allow the imports of poultry from countries with the human form of bird flu to be banned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgrace that a country is still forced to import poultry from countries with bird flu just because it may be against a trade agreement. Surely the health of UK citizens are more important and a temporary ban is possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
